short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transcribe your speech to text instantly. Speak, and see your words on screen with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scribe-a-saurus is a speech-to-text tool that lets you dictate your thoughts directly into text, saving you time and boosting your productivity. 

Whether you're writing emails in Gmail or Outlook, chatting with ChatGPT, or jotting down quick notes, Scribe-a-saurus ensures that your words are captured accurately and seamlessly.

Sit back and focus on communicating your thoughts, not on typing. 

Ideal for anyone who finds typing tedious or challenging. 

KEY FEATURES 

😀 Free to use 
🎤 Transcribes in real-time (<300ms latency)
🔒 Private & secure - we never store your transcripts
💬 Works in any website that has a textbox (e.g Gmail, Outlook, ChatGPT...)
💾  Inserts transcription directly into the active textbox (no copy & pasting)
🔤  Support for 35+ languages (including Mandarin, Spanish, French,  Russian...)
🌐 Support for accents (e.g Latin American vs Spain)

UPCOMING FEATURES
- Shortcut voice commands 

SUPPORT
We are just starting out after seeing how useful it was in our own lives.

We would love to hear your feedback! Email us at asauruslabs@gmail.com
